note: i wrote some books and gave away a library, i like to think that every poem is a love poem. i believe that 'no' is a full sentence. i used to collect old books and young cats. i don't like noisy people, places or things. my three favourite words: yes, please, thank you. my favourite punctuation mark is the colon: i have a beautiful cat, a bicycle, an old typewriter, and a ladle. these things make me happy. i own nothing. i sell nothing. i work for nothing. that's something
